metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Previous versions of Puppet Agent didn't verify the peer in the SSL connection prior to downloading the CRL. This issue is resolved in Puppet Agent 6.4.0. msalvatore> Affects 6.x prior to 6.4.0

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
